content.prompt:
In the underlined portion of sentence 13 (reproduced below), the writer wants to use a quotation from Díaz-Merced that will provide a logical conclusion to the fourth paragraph and the passage as a whole.

Commenting on her groundbreaking work, she said, “When we give people the opportunity to succeed without limits, that will lead to personal fulfillment and prospering life. And I think that the use of sound in astronomy is helping us to achieve that and to contribute to science.”

Which of the following versions of the underlined portion of sentence 13 best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: “I wanted to experience the spacious wonder, the excitement, the joy produced by the detection of . . . a titanic celestial event.”
“I dream of a level scientific playing field . . . where people exchange strategies and discover together.”
“We can only see an itty bitty, tiny portion of the electromagnetic spectrum that we call visible light. And beyond that, we rely on other methods.”

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
